title: Vladimir Gjoni
text:
Vladimir Gjoni (born 15 January 1970) is an <a href="Albania">Albania</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> manager and former player.
Managerial career.
He was put in charge of hometown club <a href="KS%20Burreli">Burreli</a> in December 2013 and in June 2014, Gjoni's contract as coach was extended after steering the club to safety in his first half season at the club. In December 2018, he was appointed manager of <a href="Bes%C3%ABlidhja%20Lezh%C3%AB">Besëlidhja Lezhë</a>.
He succeeded <a href="Gentian%20Begeja">Gentian Begeja</a> as manager of <a href="KF%20Erzeni">Erzeni Shijak</a> in October 2019.
